error_pam: Error: Could not get PAM info.
error_protocol_mismatch: Your app's version is incompatible with the desktop app's version. Please make sure that both are up-to-date.
error_pairing_packet_parse: Failed to parse pairing data. Please make sure that both the desktop and mobile app are up-to-date.
error_account_disabled: Error: The Windows account is disabled.
unlock_error_time: Error: Time on PC does not match phone time.
unlock_error_app: Unknown app error. Please contact support.
confirm_remove_device: Are you sure you want to remove this device?
error_bluetooth_pairing: Bluetooth pairing failed. Please remove your phone if it's already paired and try again.
error_pairing_not_installed: Please install the service module first.
error_user_no_password: Your user does not have a password set. Please set one in Windows settings.
error_win_account_locked: Windows has locked your user account due to too many invalid login attempts. Please wait until the lock expires and try again.
error_invalid_user_input: The specified user could not be found.
error_invalid_user_or_no_password: The specified user could not be found or does not have a password set. Please set one in Windows settings.
error_invalid_user_or_incorrect_password: The username or password is incorrect.
error_pairing_server_init: Failed to initialize the pairing server. Please choose a different port in settings.
error_unlock_server_init: Failed to initialize the unlock server. Please choose a different port in settings.
error_not_admin: Please run the app as admin/root.
notice_ms_account: Note: You are using a Microsoft account, so you need to enter your account password.
pairing_form_password_desc: Select a user and enter their password. All your data is stored encrypted on your phone and will not be shared with anyone.
pairing_form_bt_select_desc: Open Bluetooth settings on your phone and scan for devices. Then wait until your phone appears in this list and select it.
pairing_form_bt_pair_desc: Please complete the Bluetooth pairing process on your phone and operating system.
pairing_form_qr_desc: Open the app on your phone and scan the QR code to pair. Alternatively, you can also enter the pairing code in the app.
pairing_method_tcp_desc: Recommended for desktop PCs or notebooks only used at home. Requires periodic re-pairing unless a static IP is set.
pairing_method_udp_desc: Alternative to TCP. Works on any local network. Unlock prompts may take longer to appear, but doesn't require re-pairing.
pairing_method_bt_desc: Recommended for mobile notebooks or tablets. May be unreliable depending on your Bluetooth adapter.
service_setting_wait_for_key: Wait for key press at login
error_exec_setuid: Error setting execute and setuid bits for file '{}'.
error_unix_missing_dep: Could not find '{}'. Please install it with your package manager.
